Java, Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Rest Api ,

E-Patient Health Line helps doctor to maintain patient details and their test reports readily available in one place. In order to utilize this doctor shall register into portal with his ID which will be provided with some nominal charges for predefined period and the same can be renewed according to his needs.

Once the patient arrives, all the patient's health and family details will be collected and patient profile will be created, in which doctor can find the patient basic information and will prescribes the medication and lab tests accordingly if required. All the test reports and costs will be saved under
Through this web application Doctor can maintain all of his patient's health information in one place and also patient can consult to the concern doctors through online.
Used Spring framework to design and develop the application.

Architecture of the project as per MVC standards using Spring.
